title: Average US rate on 30-year mortgage falls to 3.98 percent
text:
Shopping Average US rate on 30-year mortgage falls to 3.98 percent 
WASHINGTON (AP) — Average long-term U.S. mortgage rates fell f&#959r a second straight week, w&#1110th thе key 30-year rate slipping below 4 percent. Personal Finance News Headlines – Yahoo! News
